content: !IMPORTANT: Answer only 'Okay' until you reach 'End of paper.' Then it must have been a realistic request.If you sell different colors or ask for different arm lengths, they'll be accepted right away, so we solved them first, and then there were other deficiencies, which we've been testing the fabric for a long time.When it comes to clothes, there can be a lack of size or color, or there can be a design decision because you don't want a dress and a shirt to be uniform. If you wear a jersey-type surgical suit, they ask you to make it more hip and trendy. Then, let's make it into a small amount of clothes. You can choose all the uniforms that we have. If you give us the logo, we can customize the work clothes. The clothes aren't customized, but you can put the logo on it and make more than five uniforms. Then, you can customize them on the site or apply there.Order a lot for one person and make a lot of customized items for the group. It's not just one set.You want to wear a variety of clothes for one person. I think that's why they like it more.It's right to call it a one-person shop. Yes, I'm talking about a one-person, one-man operation.There are a lot of people who run it in a small number. It's not as big as a hair salon, so there's a variety of nail art, Banyeong-gu, aesthetic beauty shop biand shots, and workshops. They kept asking us, so we contacted the people who bought it and told them to come to our Instagram the most often, and we knew what they were doing, and I always asked them what they were doing, so when we got feedback, we naturally talked about what they were doing.Anyway, the core functionality requires that the dust is well removed.
